thread.title: BRIEF-Ashford Prime To Acquire The Ritz-Carlton Sarasota For $171 Mln

title: BRIEF-Ashford Prime To Acquire The Ritz-Carlton Sarasota For $171 Mln
text: 30 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Ashford Prime To Acquire The Ritz-Carlton Sarasota For $171 Mln Reuters Staff Feb 16 (Reuters) - Ashford Hospitality Prime Inc: * ASHFORD PRIME ANNOUNCES AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE THE RITZ-CARLTON SARASOTA FOR $171 MILLION * ASHFORD HOSPITALITY PRIME INC - ‍ENTERED DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE 266-ROOM RITZ-CARLTON SARASOTA IN SARASOTA, FLORIDA FOR $171 MILLION​ * ASHFORD HOSPITALITY PRIME INC - ‍ALSO ACQUIRING A 22 ACRE PLOT OF VACANT LAND FOR $9.7 MILLION​ * ASHFORD HOSPITALITY PRIME INC - ‍TO ACQUIRE 266-ROOM RITZ-CARLTON SARASOTA IN SARASOTA, FLORIDA FOR $171 MILLION, $643,000 PER KEY * ASHFORD HOSPITALITY- ‍TO FUND RITZ-CARLTON DEAL, TO USE CASH,EITHER DRAWING ON REVOLVING CREDIT LINE OR SECURING MORTGAGE LOAN ON PROPERTY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
